description: Currently OS API doesn't accept availability zone parameter so there is no way to instruct scheduler (simpleScheduler) to launch VM instance on specific host of specified zone.
title: OS API should accept availability_zone parameter in order to launch VM instance on specific host of specified zone

comments.content: Currently OS API doesn't accept availability zone parameter so there is no way to instruct scheduler (simpleScheduler) to launch VM instance on specific host of specified zone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tpatil

comments.content: Hmm, the external caller should have no indication of the hosts within a nova deployment.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sandy-walsh

comments.content: Only admin users would be allowed to launch server on specific host of specific zone. In Openstack EC2 API you can do this by specifying --placement group parameter with the syntax <zone>:<host> and is recognized only if you are using simpleScheduler. I want to do the same in OS API. Also I will modify nova-manage ServiceCommands class to expose additional zone information along with the service.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tpatil
